statements: UPDATE ecosystem_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.2 WHERE id = 1

UPDATE ecosystem_data SET temperature = 30, precipitation = 120.5, humidity = 70, biodiversity_index = 15 WHERE species_name = 'Palm' AND habitat = 'Tropical' AND ecosystem_type = 'rainforest' AND latitude = -3.119028 AND longitude = -60.021731;
UPDATE ecosystem_data SET habitat='Forest', temperature=25.5 WHERE id=1;
